updates.update_userinfo: Update: Archangel Pin Backers and Pin Set Backers
updates.update_content: Pins are almost complete and I have some photos to share from the manufacturer! I can't wait for everyone to see these in person, the engraved metal parts turned out fantastic.

updates.update_userinfo: IMPORTANT: Shipping update and notice for Archangel pin backers + pin set backers
updates.update_content:
Thank you for answering the surveys so quickly, I'm thrilled to get production started on these! There are a few left to be answered, so please look through your inbox in case you missed yours. My manufacturer gave me an estimated turnaround time of 1 month due to the sheer amount of pins (1080 to be exact!). Updates are going to be sparse from here on out, but here's what you can expect posted here when we reach these stages:
Pin manufacturing done and delivered to me
Pins all graded and packaged, ready to ship. This update is the last chance to amend your address

With a few hours left in the campaign, we fulfilled all bonus stretch goals! Thank you so much everyone! Here are the bonus gifts compiled in a simple graphic so you know what you're getting. There's still time to change your pledge to the Angel Pin Set tier if you want that mini pin!

Thanks to many new backers, you're all getting a free gold foil sticker with your pins! There's a few days left and 1 more stretch goal to break so let's end this campaign with a bang! Again, thank you so much to everyone for backing this project <3

updates.update_userinfo: All bonus gift stretch goals unlocked!
updates.update_content:
There's 2 weeks left in the campaign, and I want to gift my backers with more goodies! Let's see if we can reach these milestones!
150 backers milestone:

In 2 days, we funded all stretch goals! I'm floored at the amount of backers supporting this project, thank you so much! We're now able to give everyone a Kickstarter exclusive free pin alongside the pins of your choice :D
But it doesn't stop here. I'm going to keep the fire going on this project so you can all get high-quality, one of a kind collectible pins. Gold foil stamped backing cards are next on the list ;)

Wow, it's been less than 24 hours since the campaign launched and we already funded all designs in the collection! Thank you so much to friends, family, followers, and good strangers for supporting this project; I can't wait to get these in your hands!

If we can reach this next stretch goal, I'll be able to gift this free pin to all of you wonderful backers! I'll do my best to get it there, especially because it's all thanks to you guys <3

campaign.story:
PLEASE BE AWARE: THE PROTOTYPE PLUSH PHOTOGRAPHED IN PROMO IMAGES AND SAMPLE  PHOTOS ARE 2 INCHES SMALLER THAN FINAL PRODUCT. CONTINUE READING TO ISOPOD INFO FOR MORE DETAILS

Hey there! My names Grim and as an independent artist with an interest in exploring new projects I'm happy to share with you all my newest project.

There aren't many collectibles available for Giant Isopods, let alone Giant Isopods covered in cute stickers; So I thought it was only natural to do what any other artist would do: Turn to Kickstarter! 

This is my first project on Kickstarter, but not my first merchandising endeavor. Thank you so much for showing interest in a new Isopod friend! For more info about the specs of the plush, feel free to check out the info below!

 Unfortunately, because the Minimum order of Isopods is 500, the production cost is quite high, hence the high goal. Many factors play into this, but the biggest one is: Plush size.


Plush Measures about 14in x 8-9in 
Features multiple embroidered detailing across the shell of the plush
PLEASE BE AWARE: THE PROTOTYPE PLUSH PHOTOGRAPHED IN PROMO IMAGES AND SAMPLE  PHOTOS ARE 2 INCHES SMALLER THAN FINAL PRODUCT. THE DIMENSIONS LISTED ABOVE AND IN PLUSH MOCKUP BELOW ARE THE FINAL DIMENSIONS.  
Image below is NOT a final image and is based on a prototype. 
Each Isopod plush tier also comes with a free 5 inch holographic isopod sticker! 

If this campaign is funded, Expect orders to ship out starting around May!!!

There is currently a stretch goal planned for an additional Enamel pin of the isopod design if the goal reaches $16,000! 
More info and design preview coming soon!

campaign.story:
THE CURIOUS TRAVELS DECK
The Curious Travels Tarot Deck, created by Mia Rozear, is comprised of 78 original watercolor illustrations. Each card reflects the traditional symbolisms of the Rider-Waite deck with an original stylistic twist. 
What makes this deck special is not only its traditional value, but also its ability to tell a new story. With just one flip-through of this deck you will find strength underneath a lion's gaze, wander with knights and kings, and dance beside stars.  I hope everyone who experiences this deck will feel like they are part of its story, as I did when I created them.  
Major Arcana (please note: metallic ink will shine brighter when printed)
To hear more about the creation process, behind the scenes footage, and more, check out this Art Prof interview!
ABOUT THE DECK
- Each of the 78 original cards are hand painted with water color and gold leaf paint. A  border and back design were added digitally.
- Each card is 2.75" x 4.75"
- The deck will come in a custom tuck-box
- The gold detailing on each card and the tuck box will be printed with metallic ink
Edit: The original 300 coreless value paper will be upgraded to better quality, stronger cardstock! I'm leaning towards Black Core Premium cardstock with linen texture, which is very durable and satisfying to hold. This is subject to change, as I'm still doing lots of research to provide you with the best quality card deck possible. Thank you so much for your patience! 

Suit of Wands & Cups (please note: metallic ink will shine brighter when printed)
Suit of Swords & Pentacles (please note: metallic ink will shine brighter when printed)

Card Box + Backing Design (please note: designs may change slightly before printing)
ABOUT MIA
My friends and I have always been interested in creative and mystical things. My friend Charlotte introduced me to tarot in high school. "Some artists make their own decks,” she told me, “it’s a crazy project to take on, there are 78 cards.” The thought of a project of that scale excited me, and Charlotte’s words kept rolling around in my mind for years. As my friends and I delved deeper into reading tarot, my interest accelerated, and I began researching the history and symbolism around the Rider-Waite deck.
process sketches
A project this intense deserved my complete attention, which wasn't possible as a full-time college student. When the 2020 quarantine drove the world into lockdown, I realized this was the window of opportunity I needed to start. 
Arthur Waite, co-creator of the traditional Rider-Waite deck and author of Key to the Tarot, describes tarot as an art form that “embodies symbolical presentations of universal ideas, behind which lie all the implicits of the human mind”. I filled an entire sketchbook with notes as I studied his writings, completely enthralled by the little stories he described within each card. I decided that in my own deck, I would try and retell these stories through my own contemporary artistic language.
progress sketches
I first sketched all of the designs lightly with ballpoint pens on watercolor paper. Then, I painted over each card with watercolors given me by my grandmother, a professional artist who taught me to paint when I was five years old. While I worked through the deck, I discovered a small jar of gold leaf paint in a box of my old art supplies. I added a few details onto one of the cards on a whim, and fell in love with how beautifully the gold reflected light.
The day finally came when I walked into my kitchen with all 78 cards piled high in my hands, ready to declare the project complete. I have entered 2021 having created something I am genuinely proud of, and I would love to share it with you all!
The Deck, unedited (please note: borders will be added on printed cards)
STRETCH GOALS
$12,000--- Two Piece Box UNLOCKED!
The original tuck-box has been upgraded to a lightweight two piece box, with metallic gold detailing. Artwork will be similar to the tuck box design above (finalized design coming soon!)
$15,000 + --- Extras UNLOCKED!
As we progress past $15,000 (wow!), I am working on special add-ons for those who backed The Deck tier and above! Some of these add-ons will include:
An extra card design
Enamel pins
Custom tea-towels with a Curious Travels inspired design, which you can use as a spread for tarot reading!
I am currently working on developing the artwork for all of these bonus items, and will update as soon as they're ready! For those who were interested in the Line Art Deck and coloring book options, I will still aim to sell those outside of this Kickstarter campaign later this year. Thank you all so much for your patience!   
please note: not all rewards are pictured
REWARDS
Based on your pledge, you can receive one or more of the items listed below (please see right column for further pledge details):
Curious Postcard: A personalized note of thanks from the artist (me!) which will be mailed on a Curious Travels postcard
Sticker Pack: A pack of 5 tarot card stickers! 
Cards included: The High Priestess, The Empress, Strength, Queen of Cups, and Temperance
Print Package: Two 8" x 14" semi-gloss cardstock prints 
Cards pictured: Temperance, in color; The Hanged Man, line art B+W
Temperance Tapestry: A 34" x 40" cloth wall tapestry of the Temperance card
The Deck: Receive the Curious Travels Tarot Deck, complete with 78 beautiful illustrations and metallic ink details
Custom Artwork: A custom pen & ink drawing inspired by your name or a name of your choosing, in the Curious Travels art style (around 4" x 4") 
The Deck, unedited (please note: borders will be added on printed cards)
To see more of my artwork and Tarot content, follow my Instagram: @arozear

TIMELINE / SHIPPING
After the goal is met, it will take 6-8 weeks for me to receive the decks and ship them. Currently, the USPS is overwhelmed with deliveries, so exact delivery dates are hard to pin down. However, I can assure you that I will be prepared to package and ship all orders as quickly as I possibly can!
I am unable to offer international shipping for this Kickstarter and it's rewards. If the deck is funded, I hope to open international shipping on my website so the deck will be available to everyone! I'm sorry for the wait, thank you so much for understanding.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
All of the artwork has been completed for both versions of the deck, as well as all rewards. I am working with a reliable printing team, and all that is left to do is place the order! 
If the coloring book is unlocked, I will only have to format a few images before it will be ready to order, which should not take a lot of time. 
The biggest challenge regarding this project would be uncertain delivery dates. Due to COVID-19 the USPS is very overwhelmed, and shipping could potentially take a few weeks longer than anticipated. Ideally, everyone should have their decks by the early summer, but I ask for your patience if this estimation is pushed back. Thank you so much in advance for your understanding!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
I hope you're all having a wonderful June so far (despite the New England heatwave!). I'm just writing with a few small updates as the fulfillment process continues:
Reward tiers that do not include the deck will start shipping out this week, so those who have been anticipating their prints/sticker packs should start getting excited! As for the deck tier and above, I am still waiting on the large shipment of decks to arrive. In the meantime, I am preparing everyone's packaging and extra goodies so that I can start shipping orders the day the decks arrive. Besides the shipping delays, everything is looking great so far!

Hi Everyone!

I hope all of you are doing well as summer starts to roll around. I'm writing today with a little update about shipping and fulfillment. 
At this point, all rewards and the deck have been ordered. I am currently waiting on the deck and the tea cloths to arrive, and as soon as they do I will start shipping them off to you! Shipping times are very hard to determine at the moment, but I am guessing that your orders will be ready around late June/early July.

updates.update_userinfo: Even More Updates: Card Stock & US Games!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!

I write to you today with very exciting news. The pledges have been processed successfully,  so the time has come to place orders for the reward items and the deck itself. 
After a lot of careful consideration, I have decided to go with a 350 GSM Coreless Plus cardstock with a soft-touch matte lamination. Originally I was leaning towards Black Core Premium cardstock, but after receiving sample cards I believe that this new option ticks all the boxes: it's strong, shuffles well, the artwork will be protected for long term use, and it feels

updates.update_userinfo: WE DID IT! An incredible end to an incredible campaign.
updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone!
I hope all of you are having an amazing day! This morning at 10:00 am EST, the Curious Travels Tarot Deck's Kickstarter campaign came to a close. Not only is the deck completely funded, but we raised enough to upgrade cardstock, the box, and more! I am blown away. Again, from the bottom of my heart, thank you.

updates.update_userinfo: The Final Stretch! Improved Card Stock, Add-Ons, and More
updates.update_content:
Hello again!

It feels so weird to say this, but this campaign is almost over! Again, I'll start this update by saying a huge thank you for your support-- none of this would be possible without you.

Hello everyone!
WOW, we just reached $15,000 and I am blown away! This response is fantastic, and I want to thank you all again for your continued support. I'm writing today with a few stretch goal updates. After a few responses and polls, I have made some changes that will better serve all of you wonderful backers! They are as follows:

Hello everyone!
Wow, this week has been incredible. Not only is the deck FULLY funded, but we've just unlocked the $12,000 reward tier! Now I will be able to print both the full deck in color and in simple black and white line-art. 
I can't even begin to thank all of you for your support. This feels so surreal, and I am so excited to be on this journey with all of you!

Hi everyone! 
This Kickstarter has only been live for a day, and we're already well on our way to meeting the goal! I'd like to say thank you, from the bottom of my heart. 
I have also made an edit regarding international shipping. While I cannot offer international shipping for this Kickstarter or it's rewards, I do hope on offering it when I sell decks on my website (if everything is funded). I am so sorry for the long wait, and I appreciate your patience!

campaign.story:
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT が生まれた理由
Beliefs in Japan and Animation Culture
japanese anime tarot
*The name of the reward is japanimation tarot, but it has been changed to JAPANESE ANIME TAROT.

In Japan, the concept of Shinto has been practiced as a traditional belief in nature and ethnicity.　Many Japanese still believe in Shinto today.　Furthermore, in this modern time, people are blindly deepening their beliefs in some specific objects in the world of animations and cartoons which are two-dimensional and also idols on screens.　To that extent, Japanese animation culture is attracting many Japanese people. 

This applies to not only Japanese people but also for people around the world.　Shinto does not have any specific religious faction. It is an animistic and an ethnic religion based on some myths, multitudinous gods, nature and natural phenomenon.　And the Latin word “anima” which is the origin of the word “animism” means “to give a life to something that cannot move without life” and it is actually the etymology of animation.
In other words, the animation culture can be originated from the culture that gives life to all lifeless things and move them, respects them, and believes in them.

The reason why Japanese animation has attracted so much attention is that there is so much energy in creative objects that are created by Japanese creators who have believed in animism genealogically. 
And the cards that are made based on such

And the cards that are made based on such wisdoms are the JAPANESE ANIME TAROT.
日本では、伝統的な自然信仰・民族信仰として、神道という考え方が行われてきました。
今日も多くの日本人は、神道を信仰しています。

また、現代では、人はアニメーションや二次元と呼ばれるアニメ・漫画世界の中の特定の対象や画面上のアイドルに対して盲目的なまでに信仰を深めています。
それほどにまで日本のアニメーション文化は日本の多くの人々の心をとらえています。それは日本のみならず世界の人々に対しても言えることです。

神道とは、特定の宗派を持たず、神話、八百万の神、自然や自然現象などにもとづくアニミズム的・祖霊崇拝的な民族宗教です。
そして、アニミズムという言葉の元となった「アニマ」という言葉はラテン語で「生命がなく動くことのできない物に命を与えて動けるようにする」という意味があり、実はアニメーション（アニメ）の語源となっているのです。
つまり、アニメーション文化は、全ての命のないものに命を与えて動かし、それを尊び、信仰するという文化から生まれたものなのです。

なぜ日本のアニメーションがこれほど世界から注目されているのかと言えば、脈々とアニミズムを信仰し続けて生きた系譜のある日本のクリエイティブの場合このエネルギーが非常に強いため、これほど世界各国から人気を得ることが出来るようになったのです。
そして、その叡智が取り入れられたカードが、このJAPANESE ANIME TAROTなのです。
78 cards all original illustration.
 About the tarot deck Cards 
These 78 cards are made by the inspiration from the rider edition and there is no extra energy needed when you do your reading.
The essence of the card will appeal to you and your senses, and you can bring out your own feeling more smoothly even when it is used for your readings.
It is said that Japanese people tend to be delicate.It is obvious by looking at the culture and the life styles.This delicacy is probably the special characteristic when it comes to art even in a worldwide view and art pieces such as ink paintings and ukiyo-e arts are created by seeking beauty in fine details.
This project of the tarot cards was started with the thought that is to heal the hearts of all the people in the world and make them happy by the power of all the wisdoms, the senses and the unique views of Japanese arts.

このカードはライダー版からインスピレーションを受けて作成されている78枚のカードで構成されており、
リーディングのためにあなたには余計なエネルギーがかかりません。
貴方の感覚にカードの必要なエッセンスが訴えかけてきて、リーディングに使用する際も、貴方自身のフィーリングをより円滑に引き出すことが出来ます。
日本人は、繊細であると言われます。
それは、特に文化や人々の生活を見ていれば分かります。
この繊細さはおそらく、世界的に見ても日本人の芸術的観点から見れば優れた特筆すべき特徴であり、水墨画や浮世絵など、古来より細かいところまでこだわった美しさを求めて芸術作品を完成させてきました。
それら日本独特の世界観や芸術的感覚を生かし、我々が持てる全ての叡智を集結させ、アニメーションイラストの力で本当に世界中の人々の心を癒しで包み込み幸せにできるような作品を作りたいという思いで、今回のタロットカードの企画がはじまりました。

 How JAPANESE ANIME TAROT was created 
in production and finished
Have you ever seen a Japanese animated tarot with beautiful graphics made for the world?
In fact, most animated tarot cards are not planned or designed in Japan. However, this tarot cards are different.
This tarot cards are planned and created by a Japanese creative team of a Japanese company called Luna Factory, and the Japanese designers who have the intention of making beautiful and lovely tarot cards to fit into the Japanese sense and making tarot cards more familiar to Japanese people.
Many animated tarot cards are actually different from the original Japanese illustrations in a sense.
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT is made to match the delicate and aesthetic sense of Japanese culture.
This also applies to the quality. Japanese quality requirements are known as being very strict.
In other countries, there are many factories that would not accept orders from Japanese customers since their requests are very specific and they expect quick responses.
All the matte-finish cards (78 cards), instructions, and the box are highly qualified because the company, “Luna Factory”, which is highly evaluated by many strict Japanese customers, has planned and maintain the quality. Please experience the high quality of Japanese products that are different from some other products.

あなたは今まで日本人が世界に向けて作った美しいグラフィックのアニメタロットを見たことがありますか？
実はほとんどのアニメ風のタロットカードは、日本で企画・デザインされていません。
ですが、このタロットカードは違います。
日本人が日本人の感覚に合うように、綺麗で可愛らしいタロットカードを制作しよう。
もっとタロットに親しみを持って使ってもらおう、
という意思を持って、日本の株式会社であるルナファクトリーという会社のクリエイティブチーム（全員日本人）が企画して日本人デザイナーの手によって作りあげられたカードなのです。
今までの多くのアニメーション風のタロットカードは、日本人の感覚で見ると日本人のイラストとは雰囲気の違ったものに感じられました。
JAPANESE ANIME TAROTは、日本人の繊細で日本文化に沿った美的感覚に合うように作られています。
それは、品質面においても言えることです。
日本人の品質要求は、非常に厳しいことで世界にも知られています。
あまりに要求が厳しく返品率も高いので、
日本以外の国では日本人向けに販売する商品は作れないと、日本向けの商品を作ってくれない工場も多数あります。
ですが、このタロットカードは厳しい日本のお客様に対しても多数のカードを販売し高評価を受けている、「ルナファクトリー」が企画し品質管理しているカードなので、
マットなカード（７８枚）と説明書と箱からイラストの細部に至るまで、全ての品質が高いです。
雑や手抜きという言葉とは縁遠い、日本の高品質を体感してください。

Quality of the Tarot Deck
tarot booklet & tarot deck box
• These 78 cards have undergone matte processing to minimize scratches during use and they are printed carefully to pass the strict standards in Japan.
• The original beautiful illustrations are printed in the bottom and the top of the cards (including the box and the lid). The designs would also heal you by just looking at it.
• The original booklet, "The Japanese Tarot Guide Book" is included so that even beginners can start reading right away. 
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT is made based on the world's bestselling rider tarot cards. Whether you are a  beginner who will enter the world of tarot cards soon, or you are already familiar with cards, even as a professional collector, our cards will be a perfect recommendation for anyone showing interest in tarot.
• マット加工により使用時についてしまう傷などが極力入らないように施し、印刷にもこだわり抜き、日本の厳しい規格にも耐えた78枚のカード
• カードのボトムとTOP（ボックスと蓋）にもオリジナル美麗イラストが入っています。眺めていても癒されるような仕様
• 初心者でもすぐにリーディングできるようにオリジナルブックレット「JAPANESE ANIME TAROT GUIDE BOOK」が付属。
JAPANESE ANIME TAROTは世界で最も売れている「ライダー版タロットカード」に準拠した形で製作されております。ですので他のカードで慣れている方もこれからタロットカードの世界に入る初心者の方にも、コレクターの方にも、全てのタロットカードが好き・興味があるという方にお勧めできるカードとなっております。

Major Arcana
Major Arcana
With regard to the Major Arcana, all the cards are based on the original taste but have a modern animation style that makes you feel refreshed and healed by just taking a look. The tarot cards are made with advanced sense of Japan in the 21 centuries, so the cards would give appropriate inspiration to familiar problems and increasing anxiety in current days.
大アルカナに関しては元の世界観を踏襲しながらも、現代のアニメーション風になっていて見ているだけで元気になり癒されるようなカードばかりです。
21世紀の日本の先進的な感性で作られたタロットカードだから身近な問題、今の時代ならではの悩みにも適切なインスピレーションを与えてくれるカードになっております。
PLAY


0.THE FOOL（愚者）
In the rider edition, this card shows a young man walking on a cliff by ignoring the dog’s advice, but the card is designed to capture the world more positively by making him look like an adventurer. The positive expressions and gestures of the young man shows his positive feeling.
こちらのカードは青年が犬の忠告を無視して崖を歩いている様子がライダー版にもありますが、そちらを冒険者のような風貌な青年にすることでより前向きに世界をとらえるような構成になっています。
青年のポジティブな表情や仕草から前向きな気持ちが伺えます。
THE FOOL

6.THE LOVERS（恋人）
This beautiful animation depicts the lovers who are facing each other.
They are holding each other's hands, but looking at somewhere different.
The expression of various views of romantic loves are described delicately.
恋人たちが向き合っている様子を美麗なアニメーションで表現されています。
お互い手を握っているのに、どこか視線が合っていない様子が表現されており、
恋愛観の多角化が表象している様子も繊細に描かれています。
THE LOVERS

8.STRENGTH（力）
In this card, the power of kindness that are not only depended on physical strength, but also harmonizing with a lion is described. The illustration is very healing just by looking at it. The real power that can solve any problematic situation with people who look fierce by the power of harmony is shown.
こちらのカードでは物理的な力のない少女が単純に力でいなすのではなくライオンと仲睦まじい様子で相容れるということも力であるという優しさの力が描写されています。
見ているだけで癒されるようなイラストで、一見狂暴そうな相手とも調和の力をもってすれば状況は打開できるという本当の力のありようが見て取れます。
STRENGTH


19.THE SUN（太陽）
It is visually pure and clean, with a girl looking away from the sun, but in contrast, the expression of the sun, the lovely girl, and the sunflowers indicates the peace.
よりピュアで純粋なビジュアル。
太陽に背を向けた姿ですが、それに対してより温かな印象を抱いていけるような太陽の表情と可愛い少女とひまわりは平和を感じさせます。
THE SUN
back side
  The back side of the card is also carefully produced,   
and the specifications are such that upright and reversed are unknown.
カードの裏面も拘って制作されており、正位置逆位置のわからない仕様になっています。

back side of each deck

Minor Arcana
Minor Arcana
JAPANESE ANIME TAROT surely focuses on fine details for the Minor Arcana as well.
It is not only for Major Arcana. You can feel the soul of Japanese craftsmanship that are dedicated to fine details with all the intentions in every pieces of Minor Arcana.
You can feel the soul of Japanese craftsmanship that are dedicated to fine details with all the intentions in every pieces of Minor Arcana. The illustrations stimulate some thoughts, feelings, and inspirations that come from the cards, with the respect for each meanings and inspirations.
Please feel the unique characteristics and flavors of the cards.
Those cards are composed of the elements such as consideration for healing sensitive and delicate minded people in the world and the kindness of Japanese people towards other people which Luna Factory cherishes as in our brand concept.
That is THE JAPAN TAROT of Luna Factory.

JAPANESE ANIME TAROT はもちろん小アルカナにも繊細なこだわりがあります。
大アルカナだけではありません。
小アルカナの1枚1枚にこそ、注意深く丁寧に細部までこだわった日本のものづくりの魂を感じることが出来ます。
それぞれの意味やインスピレーションを尊重し、
想いやフィーリング、カードから来るひらめきを活性化させるようなイラストです。
カード独自の個性と趣をぜひ感じとってください。
PLAY

*Due to the mockup being produced, we plan to correct spelling mistakes and deliver it.

About Our Team
We are a Japanese company called Luna Factory.
Based on our concept which is "Spreading a fortune-telling culture, gently embracing the world, and healing to make people happy ", we develop and sell our original tarot cards /oracle cards on a daily basis, and through the sales of fortune-telling and healing goods, we aim to make our customers smile as much as possible.
Our company puts main focuses on the corporate philosophy, hires a large number of creatively talented people, produces our products that are focused to develop the products which are really desired by customers by hearing each customer’s opinion without using marketing strategies to sell our products.
Luna Factory produced tarot cards consist finely considered illustrations and it will not disappoint the customer who use them.Since it is designed with such thoughts and the passions, all the cards are made with lots of hearts and passions of the designers, planners, and producers.
You feel blessed by using the cards for fortune-telling.
Your customer smiles by receiving your future reading.
People would be healed just by looking at the cards.

我々は、日本の株式会社で、株式会社ルナファクトリーと申します。
「占い文化を広め、世界を優しく包み込み、人々を癒しで幸せにする。」
ことをコンセプトに、日々オリジナルタロットカード・オラクルカードの開発・販売を行い、占いや癒しグッズの販売を通じて、かかわって下さるお客様を一人でも多く笑顔にすることを目指しています。
弊社は、上記の企業理念を何よりも重く考え、クリエイティブ方面に長けた人材を多数登用し、マーケティング戦略を用いて商品を販売するために作るのではなく、一人一人のお客様の声をお伺いし生まれた、「本当にお客様が欲しい商品」を開発することに重きを置いた製品作りを行っております。
ルナファクトリーのタロットカードたちは細部までこだわったイラストで構成されており、手に取って下さったお客様の期待を裏切りません。
お客様が占いに使って幸せになる、
鑑定をうけたお客様がより笑顔になる、
見ているだけで癒される…
そんな様子を考えながらデザインされておりますので、
全ての種類のカードに設計師や職人の『こだわりと想い』が詰まっているのです。
PLAY



 Our Company (LUNA FACTORY) Media 
Our company's official site(online store) is as below.
ENGLISH
https://lunafactory.com
JAPANESE
https://lunafactory.co.jp

Our Instagram account is as below.
https://www.instagram.com/lunafactory_official/
There are lots of information in Instagram.
You can follow us on Twitter as below.
https://twitter.com/FactoryLuna
We send cute, gentle, healing fortune-telling in Twitter.
selling goods list

Seeking Global Sales Partners
Our company "LUNA FACTORY" has been selling only in Japan currently. However, there has been many people from overseas who know the cuteness and the attractiveness of our products showing their interest through Instagram and twitter and other on SNS. As a result of various adjustments and discussions within our company, as well as the progress in logistics routes and communications with delivery companies, we are finally ready to expand our products to overseas. And now, we are also looking for partners who would like to sell our products around the world.
Customers who purchase a wholesale plan in the crowdfunding project can obtain “ the right to purchase THE ANIMATION TAROT at the wholesale price from next time by becoming a sales partner with Luna Factory.” Let's take this opportunity to become a sales partner with our company. And with the power of fortune-telling, let's change the world into a happier and kind hearted world.
With people who sympathize with our philosophy, we would like to become a partner, and heal and change the world together. Please help us to change the world with tender loving fortune-telling together!

弊社LUNA FACTORYは今まで日本だけで販売していました。
ですが、instagramやtwitterなどのSNSを通じて、
可愛さや弊社製品の魅力を知って下さった多くの海外の方から「買いたい」「欲しい」というお声をかけて頂き、
弊社内で様々な調整を重ねて検討し、物流ルートなどや配送業者とのやりとりなども進めた結果、やっと弊社も海外に商品を展開する準備が整いました。
そして現在、弊社の商品を世界中で販売してくれるパートナー企業様も探しています。
クラウドファンディングプロジェクトにおいてホールセールプランを買っていただいたお客様には、「ルナファクトリーの販売パートナーになることで、次回からもTHE ANIMATION TAROTをホールセールプライスで購入できる権利」がついてきます。
是非、この機会に弊社と販売パートナーになりましょう。
そして、占いの力で世界をもっと幸せに包まれた優しい世界に変えていきましょう。
その理念に共感してくださる方と、是非もっともっと多くパートナーになり、共に世界を癒しで包み込み優しく変えていきたいです。
一緒に優しい占いで世界を変えるための手助けをしてください！

Post Script
lunafactory logo
This is the first time we offer a partnership on kick-starter.
Until now, we only sold our products to our customers in Japan little by little.
However, we are certain that our particularly made products would satisfy people in all over the world.
We started this project as a kick-starter to protect our philosophy which is "spreading a fortune-telling culture, gently embracing the world, and healing to make people happy", and to make more customers smile not only in Japan but around the world.

今回は、初のkickstarterでの募集となります。
今までは日本で自社の製品を少しずつお客様に販売しているだけでした。
ですが、このこだわりの製品は必ずや世界の人々にご満足いただけるであろうと確信しております。
今後も弊社の「占い文化を広め、世界を優しく包み込み、人々を癒しで幸せにする。」ことを守り抜き、日本だけでなくより多く世界中のお客様を笑顔にできればと考え、kickstarterでプロジェクトを始動させました。
是非みなさまの喜びの声も聞かせてください！
よろしくお願いします。

Please let us hear your voice of joy! Thank you and we wish you all the best!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
コロナウイルス感染症の影響により、配送に遅れが出る可能性がございます。
ですが、精一杯クオリティの高いカードをお客様のために一点一点製造してお届けできるようにチーム一同頑張ります。

Delivery may be delayed due to the effects of COVID-19 infection. 
However, our whole team will do the best to manufacture the items and deliver high quality cards one by one for our customers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Sturdy box.
Durable booklet.
Matte cards (78 cards per set).
It is a high-quality card that can withstand the strict quality requirements of Japanese people. Based on the experience that we sold a large number of tarot cards in Japan and have enjoyed a high reputation here, we can guarantee our product quality for you to make an order without any hesitate.

ハードボックス。
ハードブックレット。
７８枚のマット加工の高品質カード。
これらは、日本で多数のタロットカードを販売してきている上で、
商品クオリティについても高い品質を受けている弊社なので、
心配なくご注文いただけます。
Reusability and recyclability
To avoid the waste of packing materials, we are using high-quality packing materials that are often used in Japan instead. We will pack our product with the least materials, and deliver them to you in sturdy and reusable envelopes.

梱包材は極力使用せず、頑丈な再利用可能な封筒を使用してお届けします。
高品質の日本でよく使われる梱包材を使用することで、
無駄な量の梱包材を使用せずに済みます。
Sustainable materials
We use high-quality paper for our tarot cards, 
but they will also be reusable once they are discarded.

タロットカードに使用される材料として、
高品質の紙を使用しますが、
それらは廃棄された場合、
再利用可能な紙となっております。
Environmentally friendly factories
Whether the factory is paying well not just by senior management, and whether they treat their employees fairly, has been carefully considered during our supplier selection and management. 
And also, only those factories who are eco-friendly enough during manufacturing processes and reuse their waste products well, can be finally chosen as our partners. 

従業員を公平に扱い、上層部だけが儲けるのではなく、賃金をしっかり支払っている工場かどうかを考慮しています。
環境への負担を抑え、
廃棄物が少ない工場を優先して採用しています。
弊社へ配送する際も、
無駄な梱包材は排除し、
高品質で丈夫な輸送箱を使用することで、
より綺麗な状態で、無駄なく弊社に届けられる工場を選択します。
Sustainable Distribution
These suppliers are asked to use high-quality and durable boxes for shipping, eliminating unnecessary packing materials, so that products can be delivered to us in a better condition without any waste.

輸送経路の最適化を測ります。
国内工場でのチェック作業を行い、
そのまま該当工場から配送作業を行う、
レーンシステムを導入することで、
無駄のない効率的な配送を可能としています。
Something else
We use a proper amount of lightweight and recyclable materials for packing, and make our efforts to improve packing method which can protect the products from any transit damage. These have been totally introduced company-wide and been implemented strictly.

軽量でリサイクル可能な梱包材を適量だけ使用し、かつ痛みが発生しないような梱包を工夫し、全社的に導入しています。

We each employee works in consideration of the global environment.
In order to avoid unnecessary wasting, we do not pack unnecessary products (test products, etc.) that won’t be sent to our customers.

廃棄物を減らし、社員一人一人が地球環境に配慮して働いています。

campaign.story:
I launched the original Tarotbot in 2019. It went well. With the help from the Kickstarter and Tarot community, I was able to get them printed and shipped out.
Having never produced a deck of cards before, I wasn't quite sure what to expect.
That being said, there were a few things that I was not personally satisfied with. 

First - the box. The box was not what I had imagined at all, and I felt that I could improve on it drastically. The new box is a more sturdy box with a top and bottom. It will be matte black with uv coating accents. 
Second - the accompanying booklet. This was a small insert that provided some great information, but it wasn't very substantial. Not a lot to it. The new booklet is a guide to the major arcana. While the majority of the pages are dedicated to the Major Arcana, there will also be meanings for the suits and the bonus cards as well. Is will conveniently fit in the box with the cards and will be about 26-30 pages long.
Third - the finish. I got them glossy. A lot of people really love the gloss, but I felt like it may be a little too much. I want to see what it will be like in a matte finish.
Fourth - the lack of borders. I had originally designed my cards with borders, but changed my mind midway through the last campaign. While I still love the borderless version, I have a feeling that the black borders will help everything pop. 

With all of these changes, I still wanted to add a little extra to make this version stand out from the original. Here are some more changes.

Backs - Instead of the gold foil stamping, I am opting for a black foil stamping. I have a feeling it will give them a unique quality that is not found in a lot of decks.
Bonus cards - With the last printing, I includes 4 unique bonus cards - This time around I am adding an additional 6 bonus cards for a total of 10 bonus cards.  I really like creating these cards, and I may just go crazy and do an entire Oracle deck eventually.

I am really excited to take the knowledge I have gained from the first version of Tarotbot and create another unique version. I really hope you enjoy these additions.
Please enjoy some of the images of the deck below.
 Here are some links to reviews and flip throughs of the original Tarotbot deck:
https://youtu.be/7d22uGK2kno
https://youtu.be/_LXWFidgEks
https://youtu.be/8smYRi2ZyCY
https://youtu.be/r0xQqVeOxLw
https://youtu.be/u9vPFxR7DW4
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having experience printing and shipping products like this in the past, I don't foresee any real problems.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello!
I just wanted to update everyone on the production.  I have received the plate layouts to check things over, and they are looking good. I am just now waiting on the printer to let me know when they are ready to actually print everything and put it together.
Addresses

I just wanted to let everyone know where we are on production. I received the Kickstarter funds last week  and have been in contact with the printer. I have sent them over all of the print files, and they are working on getting me a timeline and proofs. We are in good shape, but I think delivery may be in July instead of June, depending on production time and transit time.
Thanks again! Here is one of the bonus cards!

Over 350% funded! Thank you all so much. This has been a fun campaign.
Next steps! 
I am finalizing the bonus cards, guide book, and getting a new quote from the printer (more bonus cards = new quote).
Once I am ready for the surveys, I will send them out (it may take a few weeks though for that) - Thanks again! I am hoping that I can have this in your hands sometime in June-July.

Two more days left!
Right now there will be 14 bonus cards, for a total of 92 cards! That is almost an oracle deck by itself. Crazy! Thanks so much for all the support, this has been great. Just a few more days left, and it is looking like it may reach the final stretch goal, which would be a total of 16 bonus cards. How awesome would that be!
Thanks again for the support!

updates.update_userinfo: Information - I have been included in a new collaborative deck.
updates.update_content:
Hello!
First, thanks for all the support. This campaign has been great. 
Second, I just wanted to share with everyone something. A little while ago I was asked if I wanted one of my cards included in a new Tarot deck. This deck takes a bunch of different artists and combines their cards together into a crazy single deck. That deck just went live, so you can check it out here:

Thank you all so much! 
This campaign has surpassed the original campaign, and it is looking good for the final two weeks. I have decided on the additional bonus cards, and I am in the process of illustrating them.  As of right now, everyone will be receiving a 90 card deck instead of an 88 card deck. Thanks!
$12,000 - Black Edging - ACHIEVED

campaign.story:
This animation project is launched by WIT STUDIO.  
 ■We've Already Reached our ¥20,000,000 Stretch Goal!
■Thank you ¥10,000,000 supports!!
＜from Nagabe＞
＜from Directors＞
■Announcement: stretch-goal
Thank you very much for all your support from the bottom of our heart. We are happy to share an exciting stretch goal for this project with you! Apologies for taking much more time to make the announcement than we expected.  We appreciate your continuous participation in this project to bring additional excitement to "The Girl from the Other Side."
 If we reach ¥13,000,000...
 -One storyboard booklet and one behind-the-scenes booklet will be added to the Blu-ray package. 
*This will automatically be added to any rewards of Tier 3-12. 
*This will be a bilingual version (Japanese and English). 
 If we reach ¥16,000,000... 
-The Author, Nagabe sensei, will create an original Manga episode available online only to the supporters.  
If we reach ¥20,000,000...
 -WIT STUDIO will make Nagabe 's weekly illustrations into a short-animation.
 *The short-animation will be around 30 seconds. 
*The animation will be created in an innovative style (black-and-white animation, etc.)  that respecting the original Manga's expression.
Announcement: An add-on for the "Comic Book of the Spin-off Story" is now available
As requested by so many supporters, we have set an add-on which lets them select the "Comic Book of the Spin-off Story" together with any rewards of Tier 3 - 12 which include the Blu-ray of the animated feature. This is also available for supporters living outside Japan!  *The "Comic Book of the Spin-off Story" is available in Japanese only. *The additional shipping cost will be charged for the add-on.  
<How to Select the Add-on> 
-For new supporters 
①Click 「Back this project」in kickstarter page 
②Choose the reward that you like  
③Choose the Add-ons that you like ＆Delivery area 
④Choose your payment method ＆Click 「Pledge」  
 -For the supporters who already backed any rewards 
①Click 「Manage」in kickstarter page 
②ーon application：Click「Edit reward」ーon Website：Click「Change your pledge」
③Choose the reward that you like  
④Choose the Add-ons that you like ＆Delivery area
⑤Choose your payment method ＆Click 「Pledge」
 "The Girl from the Other Side" is a dark fantasy, the story of a world in which a human girl Shiva and a cursed, non-human "Teacher" live.
The original comic series by Japanese manga artist Nagabe was published in 2015 by MAG Garden, to close its epic story with volume 11, set to publish on April 9, 2021.
The work, with its unique touch and a worldview reminiscent of picture books and poetry, has been translated into multiple languages and received positive reviews from around the world.
The short art animation "The Girl from the Other Side" created in 2019 ahead of this crowdfunded project was officially invited to nine international festivals including the Ottawa International Animation Festival, receiving great reviews, not just at home but from all around the world.
The new project looks to create a longer feature-length animation as the culmination of this work. 
[New attempts and resolves]
In 2019, we created a short animation for "The Girl from the Other Side." I would like to ask all of you to watch part of it, any part or fragment of it. You will see new attempts at animation. New attempts do not mean something eccentric.  We see it as the ability to make videos to order, to the project's potential.
This project of ours is based on three resolves, which we want to see crystallized. The first new attempt in this project stemmed from the originality of the original work. We felt that the original work had unique expressions not confined to the framework of manga. Likewise, we would like to create an animation that is not bound by the framework of animation even though it will be an animation. All the production members are ready to face this challenge head on.
Second, we developed the animation's workflow in house. With Directors Yutaro Kubo and Satomi Maiya at the center, we will look to the union of creators engaged in animation through a totally different process in advertising, in-house production and cell animation.
Third, we will aim to create a movie with a consistent concept despite its long length. Creating long movies takes more resolve and determination than creating short movies, even in using just one-time expressions. New attempts that seem outrageous at first glance always need to be started by someone with a strong resolve. We are looking to artwork that will be able to stand shoulder to shoulder with innovative existing movies. And it is with this resolve that we will take on this project.
<WIT STUDIO Producer Kenta Yamada>
In this project, the biggest challenge was probably the fact that people allowed us to work as the directors. In usual circumstances most people would think that using us, with little experience in the field of TV animation, would be risky.
But the key point of this project is that we needed to think of a new approach to producing from scratch. It involves not just thinking about how to bring the storyline to life but with what kind of lines and texture should be used for the art and characters. We are focusing on these small details, exploring the best approach for "The Girl from the Other Side." We hope that we can bring a movie to you that is new yet unique "The Girl from the Other Side," with the original work's uniqueness and appeal sealed in animation. Stay tuned!
 When the animated short-film was produced before, the original world of "The Girl from the Other Side" was fully respected with distinctive expressions of animation. I was impressed by such challenges and potentialities of expressions at that time. This time, with the great cooperation of many people, an one-hour animation, much longer than the previous one, will be produced. I would be so happy if we work on this project together with you guys to make the new animation much more splendid. Thank you for your cooperation in advance.
 <<Message>> WIT STUDIO representative: Joji Wada
Thanks to the support of many fans, WIT STUDIO was able to celebrate its 10-year anniversary this year. To date we have released many works, including "Attack on Titan" and "The Ancient Magus' Bride" and now, we would like to explore new ways of expression and publishing in anime to help us move forward to the next phase.
Indeed, you may call this work a blueprint for that potential. Thankfully, the short OAD movie has received positive reviews far beyond our expectations. Due to these positive reviews we decided to create this "art animation" in a long movie. We look forward to this new challenge to the diversity of animation.
This crowdfunded project is an attempt to improve the quality of this movie and to let more people know about it. We would like this attempt to be an opportunity for animation production studios and anime fans all around the world to connect with each other, however little.
This project is a huge challenge for WIT STUDIO as we head toward the next 10 years. We appreciate your kind support to our production team, as the team forges ahead to future possibilities.

<<Message>> Original work editor: Kyohei Shinpuku
The sunlight does not cover everything in the morning, and the darkness does not reveal everything at night. This is the quiet story of the two, living patchy evenings—the story of "The Girl from the Other Side." Thanks to the readers of the original work truly loving Shiva's dedicated love and Teacher's poignant honesty, we were able to draw this story to the end. The author and we thank you from the bottom of our hearts.
In a world that does not change for the better, how can two people with different points of view accept each other? Living in today's world we are always posed with this question, which is illustrated in this original work by Nagabe in manga forms reminiscent of children's story and poetry. This work is filled with five years of Nagabe's heart and soul.
How about taking this extremely pure and beautiful crystal and turning it into a movie, maintaining its purity and in a way that portrays the original work more accurately ? I would like to make it a story that everyone who loved the original work truly wishes for. When I came to that point in my thinking, I felt that we needed help from you who loved the original work, in addition to the original framework of producing animation. Yes, no one else but you, from around the world, who love the original work.
The closure of this story work will mean the end of our beautiful friendship, but this project will be a new beginning for the friendship between you and "The Girl from the Other Side."
Your kind support is deeply appreciated.
In Japan, it usually takes a budget of over 10 million yen to create one episode (about 25 minutes long) of a TV animation.  
Before we begin I would like to reassure all our supporters that the production committee has already secured a certain amount of production funds to create this long animation, and that there is no risk of this project being completely aborted.
That said, we intend to use the support fund from you for the activities shown below.
[(1) Fund to improve the production quality]
Usually a TV series requires the flow to become efficient, from drawing original drawings to movies, colorings and photo shooting, as the process involves many staff members.  However, in "The Girl from the Other Side," we will put in more effort and time than we would in the usual workflow, devoting more effort into photoshoot processing to present the original work's fairy-tale-like worldview. (* For the actual image, see the comparison below.)
PLAY

Usually for animations created with WIT STUDIO, photoshoot processing section shown above is worked on jointly with external production companies, but this time we will organize an internal photoshoot team for the first time ahead of production. It is a special use of the fund to make this work stand out as an art animation.
[(2) Promotional expenses]
We will use the fund for the items below for the PR to notify people around the world of this product.
Cost of organizing advance screening with staff talk show
Cost of producing an online event with English translation
A translation fee to release production interviews to overseas media
* We will use the fund for other PR measures to communicate this work's appeal to as many people as possible.
* Details of the descriptions above are subject to change.
We intend to move things forward ensuring as much transparency as possible to our supporters on the use of the support fund. Your kind support to the long art animation project "The Girl from the Other Side" is greatly appreciated.
 [Available only in Japan] （※日本国内限定）

WIT STUDIO is an animation studio in Japan, founded in June 2012. Engaging honestly with each single work, we keep working on anime-production every day with an eye toward creating a brand-new expression from scratch. Without being captivated by trends of the times, we keep creating works in accordance with our own concept of values which have never change. Believing in the creativity and the potentiality of our creators, we keep delivering our works to the world from Japan. Our portfolios got the great success and popularity outside Japan such as "Attack on Titan (2013)," "Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress (2016)," "The Ancient Magus' Bride (2017)," "Vinland Saga (2019)" and "Great Pretender (2020)."

project_data.project_name: 『The Girl from the Other Side』feature-length animation

campaign.story:
What if the world had a little more glitter and a touch of color... 
Fairies are everywhere. There’s not a culture that hasn’t told tales of tiny tricksters, benevolent creatures, or winged sprites that weave their magic into the world. It’s inevitable that such creatures would, over time, influence our imagination and inspire countless pieces of art. 
And so, we present A Touch of Color 
A Touch of Color features original illustrations of fairies in all sorts of bright and exciting environments, whether baking cakes, weathering the elements, or dancing to a forbidden tune. Each artist was assigned a color to focus their piece on, and so conceptually, the anthology is divided into sections for each color, creating a rainbow as you flip through. 
With over 48+ pages of content, A Touch of Color is the collaborative effort of 50+ super talented artists who put their heart and soul into creating a vibrant and colorful fairy-themed zine.

THE RELAUNCH
Following our last campaign, the mod team behind this project put their heads together to make a spectacular comeback! 
What’s changed?
We have lowered our goal from $3,300 to $1,400. Our original goal took into account free compensation copies of the zine for contributors. This time around our main focus will be to go to print first!  The stretch goal levels have also been adjusted to better reflect our new goal.
**NOTE: WE ARE NOT ACCEPTING UK ORDERS AT THIS TIME
THE ART
THE MERCH
Prints
Acrylic Charms
Acrylic Pins
Stickers
Washi Tape
THE TIERS
We have 4 available tiers for everyone to choose from. All physical tiers are eligible for stretch goals. All purchase of the physical zine comes with a free digital copy of the zine.
THE STRETCH GOALS

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: BackerKit Reward Surveys Sent! + Merch Updates
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
Hopefully you've already seen the message from BackerKit, but our reward surveys have been emailed out! Please make sure to fill out that survey so that we can fulfill your pledge. If you have any questions about the surveys, let us know via Kickstarter comments or by sending us an email at atouchofcolorzineteam@gmail.com.
An exciting production update while we wait for the rest of the surveys to come in:
Postcard prints have been ordered and are currently being shipped to our shipping moderator!

updates.update_userinfo: Backer surveys coming this week! + More updates
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone! We've been crunching some numbers on our end to make sure everything is in order, and we're super excited to let you know that backer surveys will be heading your way this week! They should be sent out this week (May 12th or 13th) through BackerKit, so keep your eye out for those - we'll also send out another Kickstarter update to make sure you don't miss it.
The backer surveys will include an option to add on a few copies of the book. Surveys will be due on or around June 10th, and we'll be sure to remind you as that day draws closer. This means that shipping of all pledges (excepting PDFs) will happen in late June, although we'll start ordering some of the smaller items like charms and prints this month and send pictures as they come in.

updates.update_userinfo: Last Few Days! (+ Some Important Reminders)
updates.update_content:
Hello all,
Thank you all so much for supporting the campaign's relaunch, we really could not have done this without you!
As we approach the time for you all to fill out the survey, we would like to remind you all that after we receive the funds from Kickstarter, we will be moving straight into production. With this in mind, please ensure that your shipping address will be the same by the time we finish production in 1 to 2 months. If it is not, please contact us through Kickstarter or our email at atouchofcolorzineteam@gmail.com and we will update your information for you.

updates.update_userinfo: Exclusive Artist Interviews on Social Media!
updates.update_content:
Hi all,
Through the campaign we've been posting exclusive artist interviews on our social media showing some of the concept work by our contributors -- we would love if you could check them out and give them a share! Below are links to the posted interviews (with full transcripts on our blog):
Red:

Thanks to your support, we've reached our initial funding goal less than a week into the campaign! It's been a long process, but we are overjoyed that we can now go to print and share our contributors' incredible artwork with you.
Our next goal, at $3300, will upgrade the quality of the book, adding a luxurious soft touch texture to the cover and making the page material thicker for a little extra oomph.
To see more previews of the art included in the book, check out our Twitter, Tumblr, and ! We're also posting exclusive artist interviews for more insight on the inspirations for each piece.

campaign.story:
(Welcome to The Academy)
Explore the ruins of a magical school tucked deep within the forest. 
The Academy was once on the verge of discovering magic that could pierce reality. To protect its hard-earned knowledge from the outside world the school sealed itself within an immense, opalescent bubble, waiting for the day when it could unveil the culmination of its progress. But that day never came, and the school was left to molder within its impenetrable cocoon. 
You, treasure hunters, have found a way in.
The Academy Chrysalis is a scenario for Trophy Gold, a collaborative roleplaying/ storytelling game about treasure hunters exploring an environment that doesn't want them there.
The Academy Chrysalis takes the feel of Trophy Gold and blends it with ideas of Dark Academia, experimental magic, and barriers to knowledge. In doing so, it seeks to interrogate ways of knowing as systems of power, and explore what it means to treat knowledge as a thing to be treasure-hunted.
(Oa, the Knowledge-Giver. Art by Ezra Rose)
(What is Trophy Gold?)
Trophy Gold, by Jesse Ross, tells the story of treasure-hungry adventurers in a dangerous world. Easy-to-understand rules and quick character creation make it a perfect entry point for roleplaying newcomers, and its uniquely collaborative mechanics make it a refreshing take on storytelling for seasoned roleplayers.
In Trophy Gold a Game Master - or GM - uses a pre-designed scenario like The Academy Chrysalis as a framework to tell a story with other players who embody treasure hunters. Whenever treasure hunters want to learn more about the world or do something dangerous, the players roll different combinations of six-sided dice to determine the outcomes of their actions. Importantly, the GM and the players all work together to interpret these outcomes, leading to beautifully creative and engaging stories that the GM couldn't have envisioned alone. 
 Never played Trophy Gold before? No worries - the rules are included in the zine. 
Trophy Gold scenarios rely on themes - atmospheric tools that the GM uses to evoke coherent imagery during play. The use of a theme helps tie descriptive moments back to the greater ideas in the story. In the Academy Chrysalis, navigate a world tied together with the theme of bubbles: scenes of encasement, iridescence, fragility, weightlessness, and popping reality pervade the school and its grounds.

(Things contained within)
(Cover, details not final)
This 5.5 x 8.5" zine will include:
 Basic rules for playing Trophy Gold that will prepare you to run a game, even if you've never done it before.
 A 6-set incursion (i.e., an adventure with six acts) that has the treasure hunters explore the grounds of a ruined magical school. 
 Unique tables for character creation, including names, backgrounds, skills, equipment, and rituals.
 New items, monsters, and scene-setting aids to help the GM create engaging play sessions.
 A new mechanic that adds an extra dimension of utility and chaos to ritual casting.
 Approximately 32 pages of content in total - saddle stitched and printed on 130# matte cover and 80# uncoated black and white interior - professionally printed by Mixam.
(Sample layout, details not final. There's a zoomed-in version at the bottom of this page)


(Stretch goals)
$700 - [Unlocked] Compatibility with the OSR game Old School Essentials
$750 - [Unlocked] Compatibility with Dungeons & Dragons
$800 - [Unlocked] More rituals and items
$850 - [Unlocked] More backgrounds and skills
$1,000 - [Unlocked] An extra set in the incursion (for a total of 7)
$1,200 - [Unlocked] More interior art
$1,800 - [Unlocked] Pay artists more
All stretch goals unlocked!
(The creators)
Patrick Monari (designer, cover/layout artist) - Patrick Monari (he/they) is a full-time creature of academia. As a PhD student in Wisconsin, he studies the neuroscience of community and collaboration to uncover how love changes who we are. His work has appeared in scientific journals on neuroscience and behavior, and he's thrilled to be applying his canny attention to detail to his first Kickstarter. | patrickmonari.com / @howlsandowls |
Ezra Rose (interior artist) - Ezra Rose (they/them) is an illustrator, zinester & mixed/multi-media creator living on a small farm in Western Massachusetts with queer chosen family. Their art explores monsters, magic, queer/trans identity and Jewish culture, celebrating the marginal and connecting to the symbols and stories of both past and present. Ezra's work has appeared in tabletop games, comics anthologies, and other small/indie press. | ezra-rose.com / @magpietongue |
Savannah Gentry (interior artist) - Savannah Gentry (she/her) is an independent graphic creator based in Wisconsin working with digital media and traditional pen and ink. Her pen and ink art delves into aspects of nature in a zentangle stylistic form and her digital art explores character creation and storytelling. Savannah's work has appeared on organization websites, event promotions on social media, and created for individual commissions.  | @kawaiifungi |
Ballantyne (interior artist) - Ballantyne (they/them) is an amateur multi-media artist living in Japan - a small planet in a big universe. Their art focuses on the chaotic, and reflects the intersection of personal-emotional awareness and external validations of beauty. You can find their work as paper gifts, slipped secretly from one hand to the next.

 Poster
(Poster, details not final)
 Sample layouts, zoomed in
(Zoomed-in version of the sample layout, left page)
(Zoomed-in version of the sample layout, right page)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my first Kickstarter, and one risk is that things will take longer than I expect. However, the project is currently progressing on track. The layout design is almost entirely finished and the interior art is all complete. Writing is about halfway done, and the whole incursion is outlined and storyboarded. Once funds have been collected it's simply a matter of finishing/editing writing, fine-tuning art placement and layout, and incorporating playtest feedback. 

I expect to be going to print in mid-June, with a delivery of print copies sometime in August. I don't expect any shipping delays, but considering that the world is such a mess right now it remains a possibility. Should that happen, I'll update backers regularly.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We'll be printing the highest-quality zine possible, to ensure it both looks great and lasts a long time.
Reusability and recyclability
The rules of Trophy Gold ensure that every game will be different. This zine can be used countless times, and passed along from friend to friend.
Sustainable materials
We'll be printing the zine on environmentally certified and recycled papers from sustainable sources and using vegetable-based inks.
Environmentally friendly factories
We'll be partnering with Mixam (https://mixam.com), who recycle all their waste products.

updates.update_userinfo: Backer surveys sent for physical reward tiers
updates.update_content:
Thanks so much for your incredible support! As I’m writing this we’re *just* over 300% funded at the end of day 3, and we’ve hit the last stretch goal – this means we’ll be paying our artists more money for their awesome work!

So much of what I’m learning makes Zine Quest a beautiful thing is that it injects so much life into the indie ttrpg scene all at once. With a temporally-focused platform, small creators like me get a chance to show off their work to an attentive audience, and it’s so encouraging to see enthusiasm spread across projects. With that in mind, I want to share some other Zine Quest projects that are going on right now that I really like! There are so many that look amazing, though, so I'll add some more in future updates. Both of these campaigns are ending in less than 24 hours, so you should check them out soon if you can!

updates.update_userinfo: Backer update - things are moving along
updates.update_content:
Thank you all so much for your support - we just funded in under 3 hours! I can't wait to see how the rest of the campaign turns out, and am thrilled that you're all here with me.

More updates to come soon. In the meantime, please feel free to post in the comments section!

campaign.story:
High on the treacherous and perpetually frozen peaks of Mt. Abbot lies a forgotten gold claim registered to one Jakob Weidner. Decades ago, maybe more, Weidner packed up his family of six and built a homestead on a small, unforgiving parcel of land in a desperate bid to strike it rich. Initially he was called a fool, but, for a time at least, rumor was that Weidner had actually managed to find something in the mine. Then everything went quiet. Perhaps tragedy struck the family before Jakob could make good on it or, perhaps, driven to anger by ridicule, he simply chose to break with society altogether. No matter what happened, the mine still sits somewhere on the mountain, waiting for the right person to uncover its location and retrieve whatever riches it keeps hidden...
The Lord of Wolves is a grimdark Trophy Gold incursion originally written for the Trophy Gold Incursion Contest in 2020 and inspired by dark legends and histories of the American west, Appalachian folklore, and western horror movies like Ravenous(1999). In it, your treasure hunters will brave an abandoned and treacherous mountain pass in a desperate bid to recover whatever gold might have been excavated from the lost mining camp beyond. Along the way you'll hazard vertical ice shelves and flesh-starved animals; you'll stumble into the horrible history of the mountain and learn the tragic fate of the family that once called the pass home while attempting to survive the ever-darkening echoes they've left behind. Will you return from Jakob's Folly? And if so, would it be better if you hadn't?
Since the initial Incursion Contest submission, The Lord of Wolves has been edited, vamped up with new occupations and backgrounds, adorned with dozens of haunting illustrations, and laid out beautifully in a half-letter zine format that gathers darkness the deeper in you go.
What awaits you...
A 26 page, 5.5" X 8.5" digital zine for use with the Trophy Gold rpg system
A tale of desperation and hunger set in an abandoned mountain mine camp
Fully illustrated throughout with both original artwork and manipulated public domain images from the late 1800s
Bespoke randomized loot tables and special new rules
Five sets filled with evocative props, heartbreaking traps and treasures, and unique and deadly monsters
Four new Treasure Hunter occupations
Four new Treasure Hunter backgrounds
A sinister yet deceptively innocent villain to carry forward into your next incursions
Every copy purchased above asking price will generate a free community copy once The Lord of Wolves goes to Itch.io 

Because this is our second Zine Quest project this year, we're running The Lord of Wolves as a PDF only campaign. We know that will turn many of you off, but it will help us focus on completing our previously funded game, ALL MUST BOW, while we learn the ins and outs of dealing with a printed and shipped product on that front. The good news is The Lord of Wolves is already complete in every way and will be available immediately following the campaign, so you won't have to wait months to receive it. It's also priced lower than most other PDF products we've seen and if you grab it while it's on Kickstarter you'll be saving about 50% off the final Itch.io price.
In The Mine...
Content Warning
The Lord Of Wolves contains the aftermath of violence against women and children, and depictions of cannibalism. If any of these are a trigger for any member of your playgroup please talk to your group before running this game or consider finding a different incursion entirely. Additionally, the author and Bleak Horizons Press recommend using safety tools at your table to insure that everyone involved is respected, has a voice, retains a positive experience, and, of course, feels safe before, during, and after play.
Some recommended safety tools include:
The X-Card by John Stavropoulus. For more information please visit the Google Doc page HERE. 
Lines & Veils, a device developed by the gaming community at large. For more information please click HERE.
Further information on safety tools in general can be found on the Gauntlet RPG Forums at https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/tools-of-the-table.html

Ex Libris...
Ryan Hatt wrote The Lord of Wolves and is responsible for creating the cover art, layout, formatting, textures, some original illustrations, and all artistic manipulations of public domain art found within. He is also the co-writer and principal illustrator for ALL MUST BOW, our flagship project that just successfully funded here during Zine Quest, as well as co-owner of Bleak Horizons Press.
Josh Flaccavento helped to proofread and edit The Lord of Wolves. He is also co-writer and designer for ALL MUST BOW and the other half of Bleak Horizons Press. He is co-host of the “superhero” podcast “Tales from Stringersberg"which is worth investigating.
Melissa Brigham proofread, edited, and consulted on the interior art for The Lord of Wolves. Her help and support is immeasurable. 
Follow Bleak Horizons Press on Twitter HERE
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Honestly, there are no risk or challenges. The Lord of Wolves is already written, edited, illustrated, and laid out. All it needs now is your willing (or unwilling) attention...
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: The Lord of Wolves Available Now On Itch!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,
Just wanted to announce that The Lord of Wolves is now available on Itch at https://bleak-horizons-press.itch.io/the-lord-of-wolves! If you know anyone that missed the Kickstarter please point them to our page and if you've read and/or played The Lord of Wolves and you liked it, I'd love it if you could find the time to retweet my Twitter launch announcement here: https://twitter.com/Bleak_Press/status/1384957787302674433

That's it for The Lord of Wolves! Thank you to all 189 backers for supporting our end-of-ZineQuest venture! Also, thanks to your generosity, we've amassed 20 community copies for our Itch page once that's up and running (hopefully by the end of April as we're waiting on our business license). We're going to give the failed cardholders a couple of days to work their payment methods out and then we'll be posting a backers-only update here with a Google Drive link to the complete PDF, the text only version (for printing ease), and monster cards.

updates.update_userinfo: And That's The End of ZineQuest For Us!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,
Thank you so much for jumping in to The Lord of Wolves! I'm happy to see that so many people are interested in my dark little incursion this long after the contest and this far into ZineQuest. I don't know about you all, but I've already bought more zines than I planned to.
As the campaign steadily moves forward I'd like to reinstate that The Lord of Wolves will be available immediately following the successful conclusion of this Kickstarter, either through a coupon on Itch.io or through a direct download link from Google Drive or something similar. I gave it a last run through yesterday to make sure everything was still as finished as I thought and I added bookmarks to make navigation easier. I hate it when PDFs don't have bookmarks.

campaign.story:
Introducing Midnight City Tarot: a vibrant, modern deck inspired by The Fool's journey through New York City. Based on the traditional 78 card tarot system, but re-imagined with a uniquely metropolitan twist, these hand-illustrated cards bring the magic of the big city into the palm of your hand.
This is the Tarot experienced in New York City.
A spread using the Midnight City Tarot deck
Featuring art that breaks the borders and extends beyond the binary, this welcoming candy-colored deck invites you to imagine yourself and the people in your life within each of the cards. The detailed scenes depicted on every card convey their meaning, making it effortless to pick up this deck and receive messages on day one. For additional support, each deck comes with a guide-book that provides an overview of the art, the meanings of the cards, as well as their locations within The City. The approachable style of the art makes this deck great for beginners and seasoned readers alike. 
The Magician and The Lovers cards from the Midnight City Tarot Deck
Created by a New Yorker, the Midnight City Tarot deck is full of iconic landmarks, as well as scenes of city life further off the beaten path. This deck is meant to feel like a day in the life of a New York City witch. 
You'll find subway sign card titles on every card to help you traverse through Midnight City, with each suit color-coded as if it were the MTA.
The Major Arcana from the Midnight City Tarot Deck. (Artwork subject to slight adjustments.)
The two-part box is fully illustrated with scenes of city life.
This tarot deck was created for City Witches past, present and future. Whether you live in New York City currently, dream of moving there someday, or perhaps you lived there in a past life, this deck will help bring that unique city magic to you, no matter where you are.
This first-edition of the deck launched on Kickstarter comes with:
A fully illustrated two-piece rigid box for safe keeping
78 cards printed on 310GSM linen paper stock
A guidebook with the meanings of the cards
Access to Midnight City Stories - exclusive behind-the-scenes content only available for members
A thank you note for helping to bring this project to life!
The Magician card from the Midnight City Tarot Deck
The Artwork 
Thank you for checking out this project!
* A note about The World pledge level. The US shipping was supposed to be free, but there was a little mishap and Kickstarter won't let me change since it has already been backed. The US shipping is $5, so to make up for this, I'll be upgrading shipping to UPS and including a special surprise gift for everyone who backs this pledge level. Thank you so much for your understanding and support. This is my first Kickstarter project - thank you for hanging in there with me!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I worked so, so hard on this deck, from perfecting the drawings, to hiring a talented tarot reader to proofread the deck and guidebook, to sourcing a US-based printer. As a Virgo rising, I really appreciate the details and I've done everything I can to mitigate any risks.

The mail being a little uncertain these days does present a risk. It is my absolute dream that this deck arrives to you promptly and in perfect condition. If anything happens to your reward during shipping, please reach out to me and I'll do my best to make it right.

If you are outside the USA, I am so excited to ship to you! Please note that you will be responsible for all customs and applicable taxes, including VAT.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
